title: AWS re:Invent 2025-PwC & BMO: AI-Powered Finance Transformation -From Reporting to Treasury Insights
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025-普华永道与蒙特利尔银行：人工智能驱动的财务转型——从报告到资金管理洞察
abstract: Join PwC and BMO for a live dive into BMO's Risk and Finance AI journey, where a core team harnesses cutting-edge technology to revolutionize financial operations and reporting. Early builds leveraged AWS Bedrock to automate financial narrative generation and content creation, transforming complex management discussions into clear, decision-ready insights. As the program evolved, new capabilities emerged: intelligent meeting documentation and summarization, and generative AI that analyzes and recommends enhancements to treasury risk modeling. Attendees will discover how continuous model evolution can be monitored, tracked, and governed, enabling accelerated decision-making, enhanced risk transparency, and actionable strategies for financial institutions embracing AI-driven transformation today. This presentation is brought to you by PwC, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 加入普华永道和BMO，深入了解BMO的风险与财务AI之旅，核心团队利用尖端技术彻底改革财务运营和报告。早期构建利用AWS Bedrock自动化财务叙述生成和内容创建，将复杂的管理讨论转化为清晰、可供决策的洞察。随着项目的发展，新功能不断涌现：智能会议文档和摘要生成，以及分析并推荐增强库务风险建模的生成式AI。与会者将了解如何监控、跟踪和治理持续的模型演进，从而加速决策制定、增强风险透明度，并为当今拥抱AI驱动转型的金融机构提供可行的策略。本演示由AWS合作伙伴普华永道呈现。
